prompt:
Given the task definition and input, reply with output. In this task, you're given reviews of various products in one of these languages 1) English 2) Japanese 3) German 4) French 5) Chinese 6) Spanish. Given a review, you need to predict whether the review is good or bad. A negative review is a bad review, and positive/neutral reviews are good reviews.

El paraguas es de muy mala calidad,da la sensación que se va a romper cuando lo abres. Es muy cutre.

Based on the review provided, I would classify this review as a bad review. The reviewer expresses their dissatisfaction with the quality of the umbrella, stating that it feels like it will break when opened and that it is very cheap. This indicates that the reviewer is not satisfied with the product and would not recommend it to others. Therefore, this review is classified as a bad review.

prompt:
Can you provide more information about the collaborative efforts between Spinlock and Volvo offshore sailors in the development of the Deckvest VITO lifejacket harness? Answer according to: Spinlock Deckvest VITO Offshore 170N Hammar Lifejacket – the Deckvest VITO is the latest Spinlock Inflatable lifejacket harness technology, based on the Spinlock Design work for the Volvo Ocean Race teams. All teams wew equipped with the same inflatable lifejacket harness developed in collaboration with a core group of Volvo offshore sailors. Fundamental to the new design was a lifejacket that crews actually want to wear more frequently with developed custom features.
Coarse and fine tune adjustment. Fit lifejacket to body size. Fine tune adjust each time for layers.
Added protection in high impact areas.
Lume-On bladder illumination lights fitted.
40mm leg strap with stowage.

All teams wew equipped with the same inflatable lifejacket harness developed in collaboration with a core group of Volvo offshore sailors. Fundamental to the new design was a lifejacket that crews actually want to wear more frequently with developed custom features.

Here are some more details about the development process and the key features of the Deckvest VITO:

1. Collaboration with Volvo Ocean Race (VOR) teams: The development of the Deckvest VITO was a collaborative effort between Spinlock and the Volvo Ocean Race teams.
